Name: War Tank combat
About the game: This is a nostalgic game, but it brings new mechanics, with new possibilities and experiences. FREE MOVEMENT: You will not be limited to 90 degree angles. (How about making smooth turns or even rotating on your own axis? This can be very useful during combat.) Back up your tank. (In combat, backing up doesn't always mean running away, okay? Collect shields to activate them in the future, Shoot the explosives to detonate them. After defeating all the tank artillery, to pass the level, you still have to face a tough and clever big boss. (Don't let him get you!). In each level the game will become more challenging. Challenge yourself in the more than 20 levels contained in War Tank combat.
